results.name: Numbers n such that A318468(n) (bitwise-AND of 2*n and sigma(n)) is equal to 2*n.
comment: Positions of zeros in A324658, fixed points of A324659.
In range 1 .. 2^32 there are only 22 odd terms. See A324647.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
xref: Some subsequences: A000396, A324643, A324647 (the odd terms).
